Flow.description:
Updates Closed Date, Sales Probability, Owner Manager Email based on Selling Stage. Updates Monthly Revenue when Reoccurring Revenue OLI is updated.
12/15/22 - Updated In Year Revenue Calculation to calc only when Expected Book Date Year = Expected Service Start Date Year. - Removed Canada-IBG check from ACV Calcualtion decision.

formulas.description:
Rebuild formula field to use in before save flow
If(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Customer - Service Renewal") && Old_Contract_ACV__c = 0 , 0, Annual_Contract_Value__c - Old_Contract_ACV__c)
